name: polythene
description: Polymer inspired modular implementation of Material Design for Mithril.

scripts.install-mdif: mkdir -p external_modules && cd external_modules && git clone git@github.com:zavoloklom/material-design-iconic-font.git
scripts.copy-mdif: mkdir -p lib/deps/material-design-iconic-font/css && cp external_modules/material-design-iconic-font/dist/css/* lib/deps/material-design-iconic-font/css/ && mkdir -p lib/deps/material-design-iconic-font/fonts && cp external_modules/material-design-iconic-font/dist/fonts/* lib/deps/material-design-iconic-font/fonts/ && mkdir -p lib/deps/svg/material-design-iconic-font && cp -R external_modules/material-design-iconic-font/svg/* lib/deps/svg/material-design-iconic-font/
scripts.install-mdi: mkdir -p external_modules && cd external_modules && git clone git://github.com/Templarian/MaterialDesign
scripts.copy-deps: npm run copy-mdif && npm run copy-mdi && npm run copy-material-colors
scripts.postinstall: rm -rf external_modules && npm run install-mdif && npm run install-mdi && npm run copy-mdif && npm run copy-mdi && npm run copy-deps
scripts.build-css: npm run sass && npm run autoprefixer
scripts.watch: npm run watch-css & npm run watch-es6 & npm run watch-theme

author: Arthur Clemens
